tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_id UUID NOT NULL,
  report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE farm_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(255),
    crop_type VARCHAR(100),
    pesticide_usage BOOLEAN,
    soil_quality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    rainfall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE farm_data (
    farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    crop_type VARCHAR(255),
    acreage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_used FLOAT,
    application_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm_data(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE report_data (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    overall_impact VARCHAR(255),
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm_data(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE farm_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  farm_name VARCHAR(255),
  farm_location VARCHAR(255),
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_data (
  crop_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  crop_type VARCHAR(255),
  crop_yield INT,
  crop_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  weather_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  weather_date TIMESTAMP,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  precipitation DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE soil_data (
  soil_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  soil_type VARCHAR(255),
  soil_ph DECIMAL,
  soil_moisture DECIMAL,
  soil_texture VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Farmers (
  farmer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_name STRING,
  location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
  crop_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name STRING,
  crop_type STRING,
  planting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Pesticides (
  pesticide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  pesticide_name STRING,
  usage_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  farmer_id UUID,
  crop_id UUID,
  pesticide_id UUID,
  report_type STRING
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactMetrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id UUID,
  metric_name STRING,
  metric_value FLOAT
)
